Html:

What are the explanations needed?
what are you doing specific to get this exception?

I use a tool that offers "patterns & practices: Prism", using the pattern MVVM.
This exception occurs when I try to show the card as soon as the screen appeared and it is likely that some of the infrastructure has not finished forming.
That I do not know which way to look at yourself or look, or a GMap.
it looks like threading issue, do you launch your window in different thread?

I am looking into the code a bit later answer.
Working with the map and all forms of work in the STA thread

I'm sorry, just had no time to write.
The reason was that I worked with the fields of an object running in STA thread from another thread. Once corrected, using SynchronizationContext, all was well. But still, I do not understand where this module GMap, if he does, apparently, was not involved in that I corrected.
